channel.title: Blog on Tuitote | Tote Life
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Tuitote | Tote Life

item.title: How do reusable bags help the environment?
item.description: It’s common to hear that reusable bags – the ones you can use many times over, for months or even years– are great for the environment because they replace single use plastic bags.

item.title: Banning Plastic Bags Is Great for the World, Right? Not So Fast
item.description: This story originally appeared on Grist and is part of the Climate Desk collaboration. Like cigarettes, plastic bags have recently gone from a tolerated nuisance to a widely despised and discouraged vice.
